Steps.2: Select any number of pieces and press the Start button

Expected result.1: The Select number of pieces menu appears
Expected result.2: The puzzle collection menu appears after the advertisement is played. The selected number of pieces should be shown
Expected result.3: The pop-up window Well done! appears
Expected result.4: Main menu appears after watching advertisements. Progress of the completed puzzle is 100%. The user received the number of coins according to the conditions
